1152740.name: Asterminer
1152740.description:
*Game is Planned to Resume Development by Q4 2026.

In Asterminer, explore the calm of space in a relaxed, atmospheric journey. Operate a mining truck, train, or move around as the operator across distant planets and asteroids in a grounded sci-fi setting. It's a casual yet deep adventure with no danger, no enemies, and no violence, making space exploration a beautiful, contemplative experience. Enjoy the awesome music and the joy of gathering resources for your loved ones in this serene, unique game that celebrates the wonders of the cosmos.
1152740.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文, 土耳其语, 韩语
